title: Asian stocks gain as hopes for year-end rally grow
summary: Asian equities opened higher, mirroring gains in US stocks and fueling hopes for a year-end rally. title: Stock picks of the week: 5 stocks with consistent score improvement and an upside potential of up to 30%
summary: After staying under pressure for a while, the broader indices, the Nifty and Sensex, as well as market breadth are making a comeback. The questions to ask are: How sustainable will this upmove be? What will market breadth be like during this period? And one thing to be kept in mind: While the bulls are making a comeback, valuations are still high. So, keep an eye on fundamentals and how things are shaping up in the sector.

title: Nifty to climb to 29,500 in 2026, ICICI Direct says, picks Bajaj Finance, Bank of Baroda among 7 top bets
summary: ICICI Direct projects a stronger phase for Indian equities, targeting the Nifty 50 at 29,500 by December 2026, supported by an earnings revival, favourable macro conditions and more reasonable valuations. The brokerage highlights select stock picks and sectors while maintaining a constructive medium-term outlook for the market.

title: HCC shares surge over 8%, extend rally for third day after securing major Railways contract

While the order boosted sentiment, technical indicators continue to point to underlying weakness in the stock’s broader trend.

summary: Railway stocks saw a rise of 1-5% on December 22 after Indian Railways announced fare hikes effective December 26. The adjustments aim to balance operational costs while limiting passenger impact, generating an estimated  ₹600 crore in additional revenue this fiscal year.

title: Mint Explainer | Asset tokenization enters India’s policy spotlight—what it is and why it matters
summary: As global markets move real-world assets such as stocks, gold and real estate onto blockchains, India is beginning to debate how tokenization should be regulated, and what it could mean for investors.

title: Sensex's two-day surge raises hopes of Santa Rally. Are sharp gains ahead for Dalal Street in last week of the year?
summary: The Santa Claus Rally is a seasonal stock market pattern where prices tend recorded by indices amid improved sentiment, lighter volumes, and year-end positioning.

summary: The deal leverages Shriram’s unique ownership structure, which allows for potential future management control, and its superior return on assets compared to traditional banks.

summary: The new equity financing will support PlasmaGen Biosciences' international expansion and enhance its portfolio of plasma-derived therapeutics, following a total of  ₹600 crore raised since 2010.

summary: Application submission for the Kerala government's Sthree Suraksha Scheme has reportedly begun. The state government had earlier released the guidelines and norms related to the implementation of the scheme.

title: IT stocks rally up to 4% after soft US labour data and benign inflation raise Fed rate cut hopes

title: Who is Anand Varadarajan? The Indian-origin, 18-yr Amazon veteran appointed as Starbucks new executive VP and CTO

The shift highlights India’s appeal as a diversification play amid selective risk-taking, while Japan remains the region’s top investment choice.

An average score in Stock Reports Plus is calculated by undertaking quantitative analysis of five key investment tools – earnings, fundamentals, relative valuation, risk, and price momentum.

summary: Netflix has refinanced part of its $59 billion bridge loan with cheaper long-term debt, boosting its financial position as it seeks to acquire Warner Bros. Discovery.

summary: Gujarat Kidney IPO saw strong demand on its first day, with bids for 2.02 crore shares against an offer of 1.32 crore, achieving 1.53 times subscription. Retail investors showed the most interest at 5.06 times. The IPO is priced between  ₹108-114 per share.

summary: Asset manager Janus Henderson agreed to be acquired by investors Trian Fund Management and General Catalyst, the companies announced Monday.

summary: Gold rate today: Gold prices surged to record highs on December 22, driven by expectations of US Federal Reserve rate cuts in 2026. MCX gold reached  ₹1,36,458 per 10 grams, marking a 77.5% year-to-date gain. Silver also hit a record high of  ₹2,14,583 per kilo.

title: These large-caps have ‘strong buy’ & ‘buy’ recos and an upside potential of at least 25%

The answer is clear, the sector or sectors where the probability of Q3 earning numbers being good are high. So, look forward to the coming earnings season.

summary: The board of Ambuja Cements has sanctioned the amalgamation of ACC and Orient Cement.

title: India regains favour of global investors with ‘mildly overweight’ allocation as China drops: Bofa survey
summary: India is now mildly overweight in Bank of America's Asia Fund Manager Survey, reflecting its appeal as a diversification option. With 10% of fund managers favoring India, it ranks third in Asia, while Japan leads and China sees a decline in investor sentiment.
